MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:04pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Donaldson substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:55PM on Thursday, 28 January 2021.
